comments.text: 美股 不过买进的时候还没到。我认为升息后不会跌会涨，生息前买。the market probably already priced in a 50basis point rate hike. A rate hike that is more aggressive will probably send the market down but in light of the various sanctions impacting the world economy I think that is improbable
股票推荐BAC, AXP, 银行在生息环境中一直都较为吃香。最近这两个因为俄罗斯都被砍了一些，可以观察进场时机
个人挺喜欢qsr 目前我的portfolio 25% 是qsr，quality, stable company, free cash flow generative and trading at a relatively cheap P/E ratio with high dividends
希望乌俄赶快谈和 这个很烦 完全无法预测
putin 就是个疯子 制裁的也跟着疯了 竟然要ban Russian oil 草
Disclaimer: not a financial advisor. I have a long position on qsr.
